featured.text: Ruth is attracted… C.…when I met an old friend of mine.

definition.zh_def: 憐憫或同情的情感，特別是對他人的痛苦或不幸的感受。
definition.en_def: A feeling of compassion or sympathy, especially for the suffering or misfortune of others.
definition.example: She felt a deep sense of ruth for the victims of the disaster.
